TemplateConfiguration._Description: Creates an ASP.NET web.config file for a subdirectory.

AspNetFile.name: web.config
AspNetFile.FileText:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Web.config file for ${ProjectRelativeDirectory}.
The settings that can be used in this file are documented at http://www.mono-project.com/Config_system.web and http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b5ysx397.aspx --> <configuration> <system.web>
</system.web> </configuration>
